categories: Category:Enlisted personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Ben was a member of the Galactic Empire who trained as a cadet at the Imperial Academy of Carida, located on the planet Carida. Ben joined the academy during the year 5 BBY, and graduated during 1 BBY. During Ben's graduation, General Rom Mohc called Ben's name to present the cadet with a special award of valor and merit.

Ben was first mentioned in the audio adaption of the novella Dark Forces: Soldier for the Empire, which was released in 1997. As the character's name is only given in spoken dialogue from the audio adaption, the actual spelling of the character's name cannot be determined. "Ben" is actually the character's last name. The first part of their name is obscured by another character speaking, making it impossible to discern.
